description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into magma. The magma is hot enough to burn even fire itself.

users.circumstances: Unknown when Akainu obtained this fruit

abilityReveals.description: Akainu's magma fist is powerful enough to pierce through Ace's body and burn his internal organs beyond repair.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Used to fatally wound Ace, demonstrating that magma can overcome fire.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

strengths.strength: Magma is superior to fire and can burn it
strengths.description: The Magu Magu no Mi's magma can overcome and burn the Mera Mera no Mi's fire, as demonstrated when Akainu fatally wounds Ace.

description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into fire. Grants immunity to most physical attacks except those with greater heat like magma.

users.circumstances: Ace dies in this episode, causing the fruit to respawn elsewhere

abilityReveals.description: The Mera Mera no Mi's fire cannot protect against the Magu Magu no Mi's superior magma, allowing Akainu to fatally wound Ace.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Ace is unable to defend against Akainu's magma attack due to magma's superiority over fire.

weaknesses.weakness: Magma burns hotter than fire and can overcome the Mera Mera no Mi
